DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the patient received any additional, or concomitant, therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to additional therapy administered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did the patient receive addit
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive additional therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive additional therapy for breast cancer recurrence or second primary or contralateral invasive BC malignancy

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If incomplete resection, was additional protocol therapy delivered?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive first line systemic therapy for breast cancer recurrence or second primary or contralateral invasive BC malignancy

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_TEXT3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive first line standard systemic therapy for metastatic breast cancer prior to registration.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Prior Therapies Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any additional lines of therapy for recurrent/metastatic disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient undergo additional local therapy since the last reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive additional therapy after Block 1?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive additional therapy after Block 2?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive additional therapy after Block 3?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alternate Therapy After Off Protocol
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive alternate therapy after going off protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have a subsequent infusion of the same CAR T-cell product?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 05
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any leukemia-directed therapy between InO and CAR T-cell therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the newly diagnosed patient receiving systemic therapy considered by the treating physician as at least equivalent to methotrexate, doxorubicin and cisplatin (MAP) at the time of enrollment on this study?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the newly diagnosed patient receiving systemic therapy considered by the treating physician as at least equivalent to methotrexate, doxorubicin and cisplatin (MAP) at the time of enrollment on this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was any local (focal) therapy given during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received genetically engineered T-cells?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received genetically engineered cell therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the newly diagnosed patient receiving or recently completed (within 60 days) systemic therapy considered by the treating physician to be standard treatment for newly diagnosed osteosarcoma (eg, cisplatin-doxorubicin or ifosfamide-based drug regimens) at the time of enrollment on this study?
